text: @JardinTaylor @afterglowavery It’s just pneumonia it’s only bad for people who are old or have bad lungs and it will be over when summer comes and flu season is over more people die of the flu every year they will just get a vaccine for it some day and as you know we have a flu vaccine and people still get it
